attributes.action: Declassify all information about the Express Northern Line and pass all of its tunnels to London Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand that the prime minister hand back all partially constructed London Underground tunnels that were stolen from Londoners during the Second World War, and taken for use by the British government.

(The most well known of these tunnels is the Express Northern Line, but there is also an Underground Station below 10 Downing Street that is the property of the people of London. We demand that all known and unknown train tunnels are handed over to the people of London.)

We also demand that all information relating to tunneling activity during this period is declassified, so that the people of London can be assured that all of the tunnels that we have paid for have been returned to us.

We also demand funding, to assess these tunnels, so that they can either be finished and made available for public use, or (if that is not possible) turned into air conditioning conduits to help cool other Undertground lines.
